ListenList: A1_Why is asking about your parents' health important?
A1_To show care and love.
A1_Why is telling your parents about your difficulties important?
A1_They can give advice and help.
A1_Why is saying thank you important?
A1_It shows gratitude.
A1_Why is apologizing when you make a mistake important?
A1_It shows responsibility.
A1_Why is keeping yourself clean important?
A1_To stay healthy.
A1_Why is greeting people politely important?
A1_It shows respect.
A1_Why is being on time important?
A1_Why is keeping your promises important?
A1_It builds trust.
A1_Why is keeping things organized important?
A1_It saves time.
A1_Why is helping with chores at home important?
A1_It supports your family.
A1_Why is sharing with your friends important?
A1_It builds stronger friendships.
A1_Why is respecting everyone important?
A1_It creates a positive environment.
A1_Why is staying safe important?
A1_To avoid danger.
A2_What should you do to ask about your parents' health?
A2_Ask, "How are you feeling today?"
A2_What should you do to tell your parents about your difficulties?
A2_Share your problems honestly.
A2_What should you do to say thank you?
A2_Say "Thank you" when someone helps.
A2_What should you do to apologize if you make a mistake?
A2_Say, "I’m sorry" when you are wrong.
A2_What should you do to keep yourself clean?
A2_Wash your hands and bathe daily.
A2_What should you do to greet people politely?
A2_Say "Hello" or "Good morning."
A2_What should you do to be on time?
A2_Arrive at school or meetings on time.
A2_What should you do to keep your promises?
A2_Do what you say you will do.
A2_What should you do to keep things organized?
A2_Put items back in their place.
A2_What should you do to help with chores at home?
A2_Wash dishes or clean your room.
A2_What should you do to share with your friends?
A2_Share toys or snacks.
A2_What should you do to respect everyone?
A2_Speak kindly and listen to others.
A2_What should you do to stay safe?
A2_Follow safety rules like wearing a helmet.
A3_What should you not do when asking about your parents' health?
A3_Ignore their feelings.
A3_What should you not do when telling your parents about your difficulties?
A3_Hide your problems.
A3_What should you not do when saying thank you?
A3_Forget to say thank you.
A3_What should you not do when apologizing if you make a mistake?
A3_Blame others for your mistakes.
A3_What should you not do to keep yourself clean?
A3_Ignore personal hygiene.
A3_What should you not do to greet people politely?
A3_Ignore or be rude to people.
A3_What should you not do to be on time?
A3_Arrive late or make others wait.
A3_What should you not do to keep your promises?
A3_Break your promises.
A3_What should you not do to keep things organized?
A3_Leave things messy.
A3_What should you not do to help with chores at home?
A3_Refuse to help with chores.
A3_What should you not do to share with your friends?
A3_Be selfish and refuse to share.
A3_What should you not do to respect everyone?
A3_Be rude or ignore people.
A3_What should you not do to stay safe?
A3_Take risks without thinking.
